Queries.GetInvoices:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A."DocNum" ASC) AS "#", CASE A."U_BO_S" WHEN '0' THEN 'A la espera' WHEN '1' THEN 'Aceptada' WHEN '2' THEN 'Rechaza' WHEN '3' THEN 'En validación' ELSE 'A la espera' END AS "Estado", A."DocNum" AS "No_Factura", A."CardCode" AS "Codigo_cliente", A."CardName" AS "Nombre_cliente", A."DocDate" AS "Fecha_Documento", A."DocDueDate" AS "Fecha_vencimiento", CASE WHEN A."U_BO_EE" = 'Y' THEN 'SI' WHEN A."U_BO_EE" = 'N' THEN 'NO' ELSE '' END AS "Enviar_Email", CASE WHEN B."U_BO_StatusEmail" = '200' THEN 'Enviado' ELSE 'Pendiente' END AS "Estado_Correo", B."U_BO_Email1" AS "Correo1", B."U_BO_Email2" AS "Correo2", B."U_BO_Email3" AS "Correo3", B."U_BO_Email4" AS "Correo4", B."U_BO_Email5" AS "Correo5", A."DocTotal" AS "Total_documento", CASE WHEN A."U_BO_MRWS" IS NULL THEN 'No Enviado' ELSE A."U_BO_MRWS" END AS "Respuesta_TFHKA", A."DocEntry" AS "DocEntry", C."SeriesName" AS "SeriesName", A."U_BO_CUFE" AS "CUFE", A."CreateDate" AS "FechaCreacion", CASE WHEN LENGTH(A."DocTime") = 3 THEN (LEFT(A."DocTime",1) || ':' || RIGHT(A."DocTime",2)) ELSE (LEFT(A."DocTime",2) || ':' || RIGHT(A."DocTime",2)) END "Hora_Creacion", A."U_BO_FHAD" AS "FHAD", 'Ver XML' AS "XML", 'Ver PDF' AS "PDF", D."PymntGroup" AS "Condicion_Pago"
FROM "%sNameDB%"."OINV" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."@BOEE" B ON A."DocEntry"=B."U_BO_DocEntry" AND B."U_BO_ObjecType" = '13' LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."NNM1" C ON A."Series"=C."Series" AND C."ObjectCode" = '13' LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCTG" D ON A."GroupNum"=D."GroupNum" WHERE "DocDate" BETWEEN '%FI%' AND '%FF%' %EstadoDocumento% AND A."Series" IN (SELECT "U_BO_SN" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOSERNUM" WHERE "U_BO_TD" = 'FVC') AND A."DocSubType"= '--' ***SN*** ***DocNum*** ORDER BY 6 DESC
Queries.GetCreditMemo:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A."DocNum" ASC) AS "#", CASE A."U_BO_S" WHEN '0' THEN 'A la espera' WHEN '1' THEN 'Aceptada' WHEN '2' THEN 'Rechaza' WHEN '3' THEN 'En validación' ELSE 'A la espera' END AS "Estado", A."DocNum" AS "No_Factura", A."CardCode" AS "Codigo_cliente", A."CardName" AS "Nombre_cliente", A."DocDate" AS "Fecha_Documento", A."DocDueDate" AS "Fecha_vencimiento",
CASE WHEN A."U_BO_EE" = 'Y' THEN 'SI' WHEN A."U_BO_EE" = 'N' THEN 'NO' ELSE '' END AS "Enviar_Email", CASE WHEN B."U_BO_StatusEmail" = '200' THEN 'Enviado' ELSE 'Pendiente' END AS "Estado_Correo", B."U_BO_Email1" AS "Correo1", B."U_BO_Email2" AS "Correo2", B."U_BO_Email3" AS "Correo3", B."U_BO_Email4" AS "Correo4", B."U_BO_Email5" AS "Correo5",
A."DocTotal" AS "Total_documento", CASE WHEN A."U_BO_MRWS" IS NULL THEN 'No Enviado' ELSE A."U_BO_MRWS" END AS "Respuesta_TFHKA", A."DocEntry" AS "DocEntry", C."SeriesName" AS "SeriesName", A."U_BO_CUFE" AS "CUFE", A."CreateDate" AS "FechaCreacion", CASE WHEN LENGTH(A."DocTime") = 3 THEN (LEFT(A."DocTime",1) || ':' || RIGHT(A."DocTime",2)) ELSE (LEFT(A."DocTime",2) || ':' || RIGHT(A."DocTime",2)) END "Hora_Creacion", A."U_BO_FHAD" AS "FHAD", 'Ver XML' AS "XML", 'Ver PDF' AS "PDF", D."PymntGroup" AS "Condicion_Pago"
FROM "%sNameDB%"."ORIN" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."@BOEE" B ON A."DocEntry"=B."U_BO_DocEntry" AND B."U_BO_ObjecType" = '14' LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."NNM1" C ON A."Series"=C."Series" AND C."ObjectCode" = '14' LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCTG" D ON A."GroupNum"=D."GroupNum" WHERE "DocDate" BETWEEN '%FI%' AND '%FF%' %EstadoDocumento% AND A."Series" IN (SELECT "U_BO_SN" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOSERNUM" WHERE "U_BO_TD" = 'NCC') ***SN*** ***DocNum*** ORDER BY 6 DESC
Queries.GetDebitMemo:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A."DocNum" ASC) AS "#", CASE A."U_BO_S" WHEN '0' THEN 'A la espera' WHEN '1' THEN 'Aceptada' WHEN '2' THEN 'Rechaza' WHEN '3' THEN 'En validación' ELSE 'A la espera' END AS "Estado", A."DocNum" AS "No_Factura", A."CardCode" AS "Codigo_cliente", A."CardName" AS "Nombre_cliente", A."DocDate" AS "Fecha_Documento", A."DocDueDate" AS "Fecha_vencimiento", CASE WHEN A."U_BO_EE" = 'Y' THEN 'SI' WHEN A."U_BO_EE" = 'N' THEN 'NO' ELSE '' END AS "Enviar_Email", CASE WHEN B."U_BO_StatusEmail" = '200' THEN 'Enviado' ELSE 'Pendiente' END AS "Estado_Correo", B."U_BO_Email1" AS "Correo1", B."U_BO_Email1" AS "Correo2", B."U_BO_Email1" AS "Correo3", B."U_BO_Email1" AS "Correo4", B."U_BO_Email1" AS "Correo5",
A."DocTotal" AS "Total_documento", CASE WHEN A."U_BO_MRWS" IS NULL THEN 'No Enviado' ELSE A."U_BO_MRWS" END AS "Respuesta_TFHKA", A."DocEntry" AS "DocEntry", C."SeriesName" AS "SeriesName", A."U_BO_CUFE" AS "CUFE", A."CreateDate" AS "FechaCreacion", CASE WHEN LENGTH(A."DocTime") = 3 THEN (LEFT(A."DocTime",1) || ':' || RIGHT(A."DocTime",2)) ELSE (LEFT(A."DocTime",2) || ':' || RIGHT(A."DocTime",2)) END "Hora_Creacion", A."U_BO_FHAD" AS "FHAD", 'Ver XML' AS "XML", 'Ver PDF' AS "PDF", D."PymntGroup" AS "Condicion_Pago"
FROM "%sNameDB%"."OINV" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."@BOEE" B ON A."DocEntry"=B."U_BO_DocEntry" AND B."U_BO_ObjecType" = '13' LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."NNM1" C ON A."Series"=C."Series" AND C."ObjectCode" = '13' LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCTG" D ON A."GroupNum"=D."GroupNum" WHERE "DocDate" BETWEEN '%FI%' AND '%FF%' %EstadoDocumento% AND A."Series" IN (SELECT "U_BO_SN" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOSERNUM" WHERE "U_BO_TD" = 'NDC') AND A."DocSubType"= 'DN' ***SN*** ***DocNum*** ORDER BY 6 DESC
Queries.GetPurchase:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A."DocNum" ASC) AS "#", CASE A."U_BO_S" WHEN '0' THEN 'A la espera' WHEN '1' THEN 'Aceptada' WHEN '2' THEN 'Rechaza' WHEN '3' THEN 'En validación' ELSE 'A la espera' END AS "Estado", A."DocNum" AS "No_Factura", A."CardCode" AS "Codigo_cliente", A."CardName" AS "Nombre_cliente", A."DocDate" AS "Fecha_Documento", A."DocDueDate" AS "Fecha_vencimiento", CASE WHEN A."U_BO_EE" = 'Y' THEN 'SI' WHEN A."U_BO_EE" = 'N' THEN 'NO' ELSE '' END AS "Enviar_Email", CASE WHEN B."U_BO_StatusEmail" = '200' THEN 'Enviado' ELSE 'Pendiente' END AS "Estado_Correo", B."U_BO_Email1" AS "Correo1", B."U_BO_Email2" AS "Correo2", B."U_BO_Email3" AS "Correo3", B."U_BO_Email4" AS "Correo4", B."U_BO_Email5" AS "Correo5", A."DocTotal" AS "Total_documento", CASE WHEN A."U_BO_MRWS" IS NULL THEN 'No Enviado' ELSE A."U_BO_MRWS" END AS "Respuesta_TFHKA", A."DocEntry" AS "DocEntry", A."DocEntry" AS "DocEntry", C."SeriesName" AS "SeriesName", A."U_BO_CUFE" AS "CUFE", A."CreateDate" AS "FechaCreacion", CASE WHEN LENGTH(A."DocTime") = 3 THEN (LEFT(A."DocTime",1) || ':' || RIGHT(A."DocTime",2)) ELSE (LEFT(A."DocTime",2) || ':' || RIGHT(A."DocTime",2)) END "Hora_Creacion", A."U_BO_FHAD" AS "FHAD", 'Ver XML' AS "XML", 'Ver PDF' AS "PDF", D."PymntGroup" AS "Condicion_Pago"
FROM "%sNameDB%"."OPCH" A LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."@BOEE" B ON A."DocEntry"=B."U_BO_DocEntry" AND B."U_BO_ObjecType" = '18' LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."NNM1" C ON A."Series"=C."Series" AND C."ObjectCode" = '18' LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."OCTG" D ON A."GroupNum"=D."GroupNum" WHERE "DocDate" BETWEEN '%FI%' AND '%FF%' %EstadoDocumento% AND A."Series" IN (SELECT "U_BO_SN" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOSERNUM" WHERE "U_BO_TD" = 'DSA') AND A."DocSubType"= '--' ***SN*** ***DocNum*** ORDER BY 6 DESC
Queries.GetSeriesNumberInvoice: SELECT "Series" AS "Series", "SeriesName" AS "Nombre", "ObjectCode" AS "ObjectCode" FROM "%sNameDB%"."NNM1" WHERE "ObjectCode" = '13' AND "DocSubType" = '--'
Queries.GetSeriesNumberCreditMemo: SELECT "Series" AS "Series", "SeriesName" AS "Nombre", "ObjectCode" AS "ObjectCode" FROM "%sNameDB%"."NNM1" WHERE "ObjectCode" = '14' AND "DocSubType" = '--'
Queries.GetSeriesNumberDebitMemo: SELECT "Series" AS "Series", "SeriesName" AS "Nombre", "ObjectCode" AS "ObjectCode" FROM "%sNameDB%"."NNM1" WHERE "ObjectCode" = '13' AND "DocSubType" = 'DN'
Queries.GetSeriesNumberActive: SELECT (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_SN" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOSERNUM" WHERE "U_BO_TD" = 'FVC') AS "FVC", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_SN" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOSERNUM" WHERE "U_BO_TD" = 'NCC') AS "NCC" , (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_SN" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOSERNUM" WHERE "U_BO_TD" = 'NDC') AS "NDC", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_SN" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOSERNUM" WHERE "U_BO_TD" = 'NDC') AS "DSA" FROM DUMMY;
Queries.GetTiposOperacion: SELECT "FldValue" AS "Valor", "Descr" AS "Descripcion" FROM "%sNameDB%"."UFD1" WHERE "TableID" = '@BOEBILLINGP' AND "FieldID" = '14'
Queries.GetCategoryeBilling: SELECT MAX("IntrnalKey") AS "IntrnalKey" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OUQR" WHERE "QName" = '%NombreQuery%' AND "QCategory"='%CategoryID%'
Queries.GetIntrnalKeySearchFormatted: SELECT MAX("IntrnalKey") AS "IntrnalKey" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OUQR" WHERE "QCategory" = '%CategoryID%' AND "QName" = '%NameSearchFormatted%'
Queries.FormattedSearchActividadEconomicaOK1: SELECT T0."Code", T0."U_desc" FROM "@BPCO_MM_ACECO" T0 ORDER BY T0.Code
Queries.FormattedSearchActividadEconomicaEXX: SELECT T0."Code", T0."U_desc" FROM "@BPCO_MM_ACECO" T0 ORDER BY T0.Code
Queries.FormattedSearchActividadEconomicaBO: SELECT T0."Code", T0."U_desc" FROM "@BPCO_MM_ACECO" T0 ORDER BY T0.Code
Queries.FormattedSearchUnidadesMedidaEstandar: SELECT DISTINCT "SalUnitMsr" AS "Unidad de Medida Estandar" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OITM" ORDER BY 1
Queries.FormattedSearchFacturasdeVenta: SELECT "DocNum" AS "No. Factura", "DocDate" AS "Fecha Contabilizacion", "CardCode" AS "Codigo Cliente", "CardName" AS "Nombre del Cliente", "DocTotal" AS "Total Documento" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OINV" ORDER BY 1,2
Queries.GetFormmatedSearchKey: SELECT TOP 1 IFNULL("IndexID",0) FROM "%sNameDB%"."CSHS" WHERE "FormID" = '%FormID%' AND "ItemID" = '%ItemID%'
Queries.GetDocEntryAndParameters: SELECT TOP 1 T0."DocEntry", T0."Series", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_L" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP") AS "Localizacion", T0."U_BO_CRWS" AS "CRWS", IFNULL((SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_FormE" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP"),0) AS "FormaEnvio", IFNULL((SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_FEDS" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP"),0) AS "FormaEnvioDS", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_LlE" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP" WHERE "U_BO_Status" = 'Y') AS "Llave", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_PwdE" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP" WHERE "U_BO_Status" = 'Y') AS "Password", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_UserDB" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP") AS "UserDB", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_PassDB" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP") AS "PassDB", (SELECT TOP 1 A."U_BO_RutaPDF" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP" A) AS "RutaPDF", (SELECT TOP 1 A."U_BO_RutaXML" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP" A) AS "RutaXML", (SELECT TOP 1 A."U_BO_RutaCRL" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP" A) AS "RutaCR", (SELECT TOP 1 COALESCE(A."U_BO_GXP",'N') FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP" A) AS "GeneraXMLP", T1."U_BO_PREF" AS "PrefijoDes" FROM "%sNameDB%"."%Tabla%" T0 LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."@BOSERNUM" T1 ON T0."Series"=T1."Code" WHERE T0."DocNum" = '%sDocNumInvoice%' AND T0."Series" = '%sSerieNumeracion%' AND T0."DocSubType" = '%DocSubType%'
Queries.GetDocEntryAndParametersService:
SELECT TOP 1 T0."DocEntry", T0."DocNum", T0."Series", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_L" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP") AS "Localizacion", T0."U_BO_CRWS" AS "CRWS", COALESCE((SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_FormE" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP"),0) AS "FormaEnvio", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_LlE" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP" WHERE U_BO_Status = 'Y') AS "Llave", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_PwdE" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP" WHERE U_BO_Status = 'Y') AS "Password", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_UserDB" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP") AS "UserDB", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_PassDB" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP") AS "PassDB", (SELECT TOP 1 A."U_BO_RutaPDF" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP" A) AS "RutaPDF", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_RutaXML" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP") AS "RutaXML", (SELECT TOP 1 A."U_BO_RutaCRL" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP" A) AS "RutaCR", (SELECT TOP 1 A."U_BO_GXP" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP" A) AS "GeneraXMLP", T1."U_BO_PREF" AS "PrefijoDes"
FROM "%sNameDB%"."%Tabla%" T0 LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."@BOSERNUM" T1 ON T0."Series"=T1."Code" WHERE T0."DocEntry" = '%sDocEntry%'
Queries.GetParameterstoSend: SELECT TOP 1 "XmlPath" AS "XmlPath", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_LlE" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP" WHERE "U_BO_Status" = 'Y') AS "TokenEmpresa", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_PwdE" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP" WHERE "U_BO_Status" = 'Y') AS "TokenPassword" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OADM"
Queries.GetRPTDoc: SELECT T0."CODE" AS "TipoDoc", T0."DEFLT_REP" AS "ID_Layout", T1."DocName" AS "NombreFormato", (SELECT TOP 1 A."U_BO_RutaCRL" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP" A) AS "RutaCRL" FROM "%sNameDB%"."RTYP" T0 LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."RDOC" T1 ON T0."DEFLT_REP"="DocCode" WHERE T0."CODE" = '%TypeDoc%'
Queries.GetRPTDocUser: SELECT TOP 1 "DoumntDode" AS "TipoDoc", T0."DfltReport" AS "ID_Layout", T1."DocName" AS "NombreFormato", (SELECT TOP 1 A."U_BO_RutaCRL" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP" A) AS "RutaPDFyXML" FROM "%sNameDB%"."RDFL" T0 INNER JOIN "%sNameDB%"."RDOC" T1 ON T0."DfltReport" = T1."DocCode" WHERE "DoumntDode" = '%TypeDoc%' AND T0."UserId" = '%UserId%'
Queries.GetCUFEInvoice:
SELECT TOP 1 T0."U_BO_CUFE" AS "CUFE", CASE WHEN (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_Pref" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP") = 'Y' THEN (T2."BeginStr"||CAST(T0."DocNum" AS NVARCHAR(20))) ELSE CAST(T0."DocNum" AS NVARCHAR(20))END AS "consecutivoDocumento", TO_VARCHAR(T0."DocDate", 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "fechaEmision"
FROM "%sNameDB%"."OINV" T0 LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."NNM1" T2 ON T0."Series"=T2."Series" AND T2."ObjectCode" = '13'
WHERE T0."DocNum" = '%DocNum%'
Queries.GetCUFEDebitNote:
SELECT TOP 1 T0."U_BO_CUFE" AS "CUFE",
CASE WHEN (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_Pref" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP") = 'Y' THEN (T2."U_BO_PREF"||CAST(T0."DocNum" AS NVARCHAR(20))) ELSE CAST(T0."DocNum" AS NVARCHAR(20))END AS "consecutivoDocumento",
TO_VARCHAR(T0."DocDate", 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "fechaEmision"
FROM "%sNameDB%"."OINV" T0 LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."@BOSERNUM" T2 ON T0."Series"=T2."Code" WHERE T0."DocNum" = '%DocNum%' AND "DocSubType" = '--'
Queries.GetInvoiceandPrefijo: SELECT TOP 1 CONCAT(T1."BeginStr",CAST(T0."DocNum" AS NVARCHAR(20))) AS "PrefWithDoc", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_LlE" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP") AS "TokenEmpresa", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_PwdE" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP") AS "TokenPassword" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OINV" T0 LEFT JOIN "%sNameDB%"."NNM1" T1 ON T0."Series"=T1."Series" AND T1."ObjectCode" = '13' WHERE T0."DocNum" = '%NoDoc%' AND T0."DocSubType" != 'DN'
Queries.GetModoandURL: SELECT TOP 1 CASE WHEN "U_BO_Mdo" = 'PRU' THEN "U_BO_URLWSPRU" ELSE "U_BO_URLWSPRD" END AS "URLTFHKA", "U_BO_Mdo" AS "Modo", "U_BO_MI" AS "ModoIntegracion", "U_BO_PC" AS "ProtocoloComunicacion" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP" WHERE %Estado% %DocEntry%
Queries.DecimalQuantity: SELECT CASE B."Decimals" WHEN '-1' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 "QueryDec" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OADM") ELSE B."Decimals" END AS "CantidadDecimales" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OCRN" B WHERE B."CurrCode" = (SELECT "MainCurncy" FROM "%sNameDB%"."OADM")
Queries.SerachNextCode: SELECT CAST(RIGHT('0000000000' || Ltrim(Rtrim(COUNT("Code")+1)),10) AS NVARCHAR(100)) AS "ID" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEE"
Queries.GetLlaveAndPassword: SELECT (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_LlE" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP" WHERE "U_BO_Status" = 'Y') AS "Llave", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_PwdE" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP" WHERE "U_BO_Status" = 'Y') AS "Password" FROM DUMMY
